info.name: annoyances [Firefox devtools]
info.description: Stylish applies styles as data: URLs. In Firefox 50, Developer Tools started showing all of the data: URL in the 'Computed' panel. This style limits that to one line. (Oh Firefox, you suck!)
info.additionalInfo: To fix the 'Browser Toolbox', find its profile and copy the same code into userChrome.css.
